scripts.build:dev:with-reports: npm run build:test && npm run copy:reports:dev
scripts.test:all: npm run test:ci && npm run e2e:ci
scripts.test:all:ignore-failures: npm run test:ci:ignore-failures && npm run e2e:ci:ignore-failures
scripts.test:ci:ignore-failures: npm run test:ci || echo 'Unit tests had failures but continuing...'
scripts.copy:reports:dev: powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports' -Force }; if (!(Test-Path '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports\coverage')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports\coverage' -Force }; if (!(Test-Path '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports\cypress')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports\cypress' -Force }; Copy-Item -Path 'coverage\*' -Destination '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports\coverage\' -Recurse -Force; Copy-Item -Path 'cypress\reports\*' -Destination '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports\cypress\' -Recurse -Force; Write-Host 'Reports copied to dev server'"
scripts.deploy:test: npm run build:test && echo 'Ready for deployment with test reports'
scripts.deploy:dev:with-reports: npm run build:dev:with-reports && echo 'Deployed to dev server with test reports'
scripts.deploy:dev:with-reports:force: npm run build:test:force && npm run copy:reports:dev && echo 'Deployed to dev server with test reports (ignoring test failures)'
scripts.e2e:ci:ignore-failures: npm run e2e:ci || echo 'E2E tests had failures but continuing...'
